name: Airport Madness World Edition Free
description:
MADE BY REAL WORLD AIR TRAFFIC CONTROLLERS

Do you have what it takes to be an air traffic controller at a busy international airport? In this game you will work at eight of the world's busiest airports. It is your job is to keep aircraft from crashing into each other, while avoiding delays.

OVER 75,000 COPIES OF AIRPORT MADNESS SOLD!

The Airport Madness series began in 2008, and has sold more than 75,000 copies. Airport Madness: World Edition is the sixth and most popular version of the series.

You are paid the big bucks for your visualization skills and guts. Just like the real job of an air traffic controller, you must pay attention and keep your eyes moving. There is always something that you should be doing. You must give takeoff clearances, landing clearances and taxi clearances in a strategic effort to maintain safety and efficiency where there would otherwise be total chaos. This is not a spectator's sport! Can you hack it?

Human pilot voices, a radar screen, seven different real-world airports, plus an awesome soundtrack make this game a must-have for anyone who likes aviation.

EIGHT AVAILABLE LEVELS

San Francisco
Honolulu
London
Las Vegas
Vancouver
Anchorage
New York JFK
Funchal, Madeira
